hooks.prompt:
ROS Plugin loaded.

Before running ROS commands in a new session:
1. Run /master to discover available ROS masters
2. This sets ROS_MASTER_URI for the session
3. Skip if you know the master is localhost:11311

Track whether ROS master has been discovered this session. If user runs a ROS command without prior /master, prompt them to run it first.

Available commands: /status, /topics, /services, /params, /tf, /build, /launch, /record, /diag, /master
